component.name: getLeadById
component.description: Retrieves a lead for a given Marketo Id

component.name: getMultipleLeadsByFilterType
component.description: Retrieves multiple leads for given search criteria

component.name: getMultipleLeadsByListId
component.description: Retrieves multiple leads from a given list id

component.name: createAndUpdateLeads
component.description: Creates a new lead or Updates an existing lead

component.name: associateLead
component.description: Associates a lead with a cookie value

component.name: getLeadPartitions
component.description: Retrieves a list of lead partitions in a Marketo instance

component.name: getMultipleLeadsByProgramId
component.description: Retrieves multiple leads from a given program id

component.name: deleteLead
component.description: Deletes leads with the given ids

component.name: describe
component.description: Retrieves all fields and the data type of a lead object

component.name: getImportLeadStatus
component.description: Returns the status of lead operation from Import Lead API call

component.name: getImportFailureFile
component.description: Retrieves of the failure file from a ImportLead Call

component.name: getImportWarningFile
component.description: Retrieves of the warning file from a ImportLead Call

component.name: import
component.description: Returns of the warning file from a Import Lead API Call
